text.ar: بِسۡمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحۡمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِیمِ وَٱلضُّحَىٰ

text.en: and the night when it grows still and dark.
text.ar: وَٱلَّیۡلِ إِذَا سَجَىٰ

text.en: Thy Sustainer has not forsaken thee, nor does He scorn thee:
text.ar: مَا وَدَّعَكَ رَبُّكَ وَمَا قَلَىٰ

text.en: for, indeed, the life to come will be better for thee than this earlier part [of thy life]!
text.ar: وَلَلۡـَٔاخِرَةُ خَیۡرࣱ لَّكَ مِنَ ٱلۡأُولَىٰ

text.en: And, indeed, in time will thy Sustainer grant thee [what thy heart desires], and thou shalt be well-pleased.
text.ar: وَلَسَوۡفَ یُعۡطِیكَ رَبُّكَ فَتَرۡضَىٰۤ

text.en: Has He not found thee an orphan, and given thee shelter?
text.ar: أَلَمۡ یَجِدۡكَ یَتِیمࣰا فَـَٔاوَىٰ

text.en: And found thee lost on thy way, and guided thee?
text.ar: وَوَجَدَكَ ضَاۤلࣰّا فَهَدَىٰ

text.en: And found thee in want, and given thee sufficiency?
text.ar: وَوَجَدَكَ عَاۤىِٕلࣰا فَأَغۡنَىٰ

text.en: Therefore, the orphan shalt thou never wrong,
text.ar: فَأَمَّا ٱلۡیَتِیمَ فَلَا تَقۡهَرۡ

text.en: and him that seeks [thy] help shalt thou never chide,
text.ar: وَأَمَّا ٱلسَّاۤىِٕلَ فَلَا تَنۡهَرۡ

text.en: and of thy Sustainer's blessings shalt thou [ever] speak.
text.ar: وَأَمَّا بِنِعۡمَةِ رَبِّكَ فَحَدِّثۡ

text.en: HAVE WE NOT opened up thy heart,
text.ar: بِسۡمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحۡمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِیمِ أَلَمۡ نَشۡرَحۡ لَكَ صَدۡرَكَ

text.en: and lifted from thee the burden
text.ar: وَوَضَعۡنَا عَنكَ وِزۡرَكَ

text.en: that had weighed so heavily on thy back?
text.ar: ٱلَّذِیۤ أَنقَضَ ظَهۡرَكَ

text.en: And [have We not] raised thee high in dignity?
text.ar: وَرَفَعۡنَا لَكَ ذِكۡرَكَ

text.en: And, behold, with every hardship comes ease:
text.ar: فَإِنَّ مَعَ ٱلۡعُسۡرِ یُسۡرًا

text.en: verily, with every hardship comes ease!
text.ar: إِنَّ مَعَ ٱلۡعُسۡرِ یُسۡرࣰا

text.en: Hence, when thou art freed [from distress], remain steadfast,
text.ar: فَإِذَا فَرَغۡتَ فَٱنصَبۡ

text.en: and unto thy Sustainer turn with love.
text.ar: وَإِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ فَٱرۡغَب

text.en: CONSIDER the fig and the olive,
text.ar: بِّسۡمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحۡمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِیمِ وَٱلتِّینِ وَٱلزَّیۡتُونِ

text.en: and Mount Sinai,
text.ar: وَطُورِ سِینِینَ

text.en: and this land secure!
text.ar: وَهَـٰذَا ٱلۡبَلَدِ ٱلۡأَمِینِ

text.en: Verily, We create man in the best conformation;
text.ar: لَقَدۡ خَلَقۡنَا ٱلۡإِنسَـٰنَ فِیۤ أَحۡسَنِ تَقۡوِیمࣲ

text.en: and thereafter We reduce him to the lowest of low
text.ar: ثُمَّ رَدَدۡنَـٰهُ أَسۡفَلَ سَـٰفِلِینَ

text.en: excepting only such as attain to faith and do good works: and theirs shall be a reward unending!
text.ar: إِلَّا ٱلَّذِینَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ فَلَهُمۡ أَجۡرٌ غَیۡرُ مَمۡنُونࣲ

text.en: What, then, [O man,] could henceforth cause thee to give the lie to this moral law?
text.ar: فَمَا یُكَذِّبُكَ بَعۡدُ بِٱلدِّینِ

text.en: Is not God the most just of judges?
text.ar: أَلَیۡسَ ٱللَّهُ بِأَحۡكَمِ ٱلۡحَـٰكِمِینَ

text.en: READ in the name of thy Sustainer, who has-
text.ar: بِسۡمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحۡمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِیمِ ٱقۡرَأۡ بِٱسۡمِ رَبِّكَ ٱلَّذِی خَلَقَ

text.en: created man out of a germ-cell
text.ar: خَلَقَ ٱلۡإِنسَـٰنَ مِنۡ عَلَقٍ

text.en: Read - for thy Sustainer is the Most Bountiful One
text.ar: ٱقۡرَأۡ وَرَبُّكَ ٱلۡأَكۡرَمُ

text.en: who has taught [man] the use of the pen –
text.ar: ٱلَّذِی عَلَّمَ بِٱلۡقَلَمِ

text.en: taught man what he did not know!
text.ar: عَلَّمَ ٱلۡإِنسَـٰنَ مَا لَمۡ یَعۡلَمۡ

text.en: Nay, verily, man becomes grossly overweening
text.ar: كَلَّاۤ إِنَّ ٱلۡإِنسَـٰنَ لَیَطۡغَىٰۤ

text.en: whenever he believes himself to be self-sufficient:
text.ar: أَن رَّءَاهُ ٱسۡتَغۡنَىٰۤ

text.en: for, behold, unto thy Sustainer all must return.
text.ar: إِنَّ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ ٱلرُّجۡعَىٰۤ

text.en: HAST THOU ever considered him who tries to prevent
text.ar: أَرَءَیۡتَ ٱلَّذِی یَنۡهَىٰ

text.en: a servant [of God] from praying?
text.ar: عَبۡدًا إِذَا صَلَّىٰۤ

text.en: Hast thou considered whether he is on the right way,
text.ar: أَرَءَیۡتَ إِن كَانَ عَلَى ٱلۡهُدَىٰۤ

text.en: or is concerned with God-consciousness?
text.ar: أَوۡ أَمَرَ بِٱلتَّقۡوَىٰۤ

text.en: Hast thou considered whether he may [not] be giving the lie to the truth and turning his back [upon it]?
text.ar: أَرَءَیۡتَ إِن كَذَّبَ وَتَوَلَّىٰۤ

text.en: Does he, then, not know that God sees [all]?
text.ar: أَلَمۡ یَعۡلَم بِأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ یَرَىٰ

text.en: Nay, if he desist not, We shall most surely drag him down upon his forehead
text.ar: كَلَّا لَىِٕن لَّمۡ یَنتَهِ لَنَسۡفَعَۢا بِٱلنَّاصِیَةِ

text.en: the lying, rebellious forehead! –
text.ar: نَاصِیَةࣲ كَـٰذِبَةٍ خَاطِئَةࣲ

text.en: and then let him summon [to his aid] the counsels of his own [spurious] wisdom,
text.ar: فَلۡیَدۡعُ نَادِیَهُۥ

text.en: [the while] We shall summon the forces of heavenly chastisement!
text.ar: سَنَدۡعُ ٱلزَّبَانِیَةَ

text.en: Nay, pay thou no heed to him, but prostrate thyself [before God] and draw close [unto Him]!
text.ar: كَلَّا لَا تُطِعۡهُ وَٱسۡجُدۡ وَٱقۡتَرِب ۩

text.en: BEHOLD, from on high have We bestowed this [divine writ] on Night of Destiny.
text.ar: بِّسۡمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحۡمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِیمِ إِنَّاۤ أَنزَلۡنَـٰهُ فِی لَیۡلَةِ ٱلۡقَدۡرِ

text.en: And what could make thee conceive what it is, that Night of Destiny?
text.ar: وَمَاۤ أَدۡرَىٰكَ مَا لَیۡلَةُ ٱلۡقَدۡرِ

text.en: The Night of Destiny is better than a thousand months:
text.ar: لَیۡلَةُ ٱلۡقَدۡرِ خَیۡرࣱ مِّنۡ أَلۡفِ شَهۡرࣲ

text.en: in hosts descend in it the angels, bearing divine inspiration by their Sustainer's leave; from all [evil] that may happen
text.ar: تَنَزَّلُ ٱلۡمَلَـٰۤىِٕكَةُ وَٱلرُّوحُ فِیهَا بِإِذۡنِ رَبِّهِم مِّن كُلِّ أَمۡرࣲ

text.en: does it make secure, until the rise of dawn.
text.ar: سَلَـٰمٌ هِیَ حَتَّىٰ مَطۡلَعِ ٱلۡفَجۡرِ

text.en: IT IS NOT [conceivable] that such as are bent on denying the truth - [be they] from among the followers of earlier revelation or from among those who ascribe divinity to aught beside God should ever be abandoned [by Him] ere there comes unto them the [full] evidence of the truth:
text.ar: بِسۡمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحۡمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِیمِ لَمۡ یَكُنِ ٱلَّذِینَ كَفَرُوا۟ مِنۡ أَهۡلِ ٱلۡكِتَـٰبِ وَٱلۡمُشۡرِكِینَ مُنفَكِّینَ حَتَّىٰ تَأۡتِیَهُمُ ٱلۡبَیِّنَةُ

text.en: an apostle from God, conveying [unto them] revelations blest with purity,
text.ar: رَسُولࣱ مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ یَتۡلُوا۟ صُحُفࣰا مُّطَهَّرَةࣰ

text.en: wherein there are ordinances of ever-true soundness and clarity.
text.ar: فِیهَا كُتُبࣱ قَیِّمَةࣱ

text.en: Now those who have been vouchsafed revelation aforetime did break up their unity [of faith] after such an evidence of the truth had come to them.
text.ar: وَمَا تَفَرَّقَ ٱلَّذِینَ أُوتُوا۟ ٱلۡكِتَـٰبَ إِلَّا مِنۢ بَعۡدِ مَا جَاۤءَتۡهُمُ ٱلۡبَیِّنَةُ

text.en: And withal, they were not enjoined aught but that they should worship God, sincere in their faith in Him alone, turning away from all that is false; and that they should be constant in prayer; and that they should spend in charity: for this is a moral law endowed with ever-true soundness and clarity.
text.ar: وَمَاۤ أُمِرُوۤا۟ إِلَّا لِیَعۡبُدُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ مُخۡلِصِینَ لَهُ ٱلدِّینَ حُنَفَاۤءَ وَیُقِیمُوا۟ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَیُؤۡتُوا۟ ٱلزَّكَوٰةَۚ وَذَ ٰ⁠لِكَ دِینُ ٱلۡقَیِّمَةِ

text.en: Verily, those who [despite all evidence] are bent on denying the truth - [be they] from among the followers of earlier revelation or from among those who ascribe divinity to aught beside God - will find themselves in the fire of hell, therein to abide: they are the worst of all creatures.
text.ar: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِینَ كَفَرُوا۟ مِنۡ أَهۡلِ ٱلۡكِتَـٰبِ وَٱلۡمُشۡرِكِینَ فِی نَارِ جَهَنَّمَ خَـٰلِدِینَ فِیهَاۤۚ أُو۟لَـٰۤىِٕكَ هُمۡ شَرُّ ٱلۡبَرِیَّةِ

text.en: [And,] verily, those who have attained to faith, and do righteous deeds - it is they, they who are the best of all creatures.
text.ar: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِینَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ أُو۟لَـٰۤىِٕكَ هُمۡ خَیۡرُ ٱلۡبَرِیَّةِ

text.en: Their reward [awaits them] with God: gardens of perpetual bliss, through which running waters flow, therein to abide beyond the count of time; well-pleased is God with them, and well-pleased are they with Him: all this awaits him who of his Sustainer stands in awe!.
text.ar: جَزَاۤؤُهُمۡ عِندَ رَبِّهِمۡ جَنَّـٰتُ عَدۡنࣲ تَجۡرِی مِن تَحۡتِهَا ٱلۡأَنۡهَـٰرُ خَـٰلِدِینَ فِیهَاۤ أَبَدࣰاۖ رَّضِیَ ٱللَّهُ عَنۡهُمۡ وَرَضُوا۟ عَنۡهُۚ ذَ ٰ⁠لِكَ لِمَنۡ خَشِیَ رَبَّهُۥ

text.en: WHEN THE EARTH quakes with her [last] mighty quaking,
text.ar: بِسۡمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحۡمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِیمِ إِذَا زُلۡزِلَتِ ٱلۡأَرۡضُ زِلۡزَالَهَا

text.en: and [when] the earth yields up her burdens,
text.ar: وَأَخۡرَجَتِ ٱلۡأَرۡضُ أَثۡقَالَهَا

text.en: and man cries out, "What has happened to her?" -
text.ar: وَقَالَ ٱلۡإِنسَـٰنُ مَا لَهَا

text.en: on that Day will she recount all her tidings,
text.ar: یَوۡمَىِٕذࣲ تُحَدِّثُ أَخۡبَارَهَا

text.en: as thy Sustainer will have inspired her to do!
text.ar: بِأَنَّ رَبَّكَ أَوۡحَىٰ لَهَا

text.en: On that Day will all men come forward, cut off from one another, to be shown their [past] deeds.
text.ar: یَوۡمَىِٕذࣲ یَصۡدُرُ ٱلنَّاسُ أَشۡتَاتࣰا لِّیُرَوۡا۟ أَعۡمَـٰلَهُمۡ

text.en: And so, he who shall have done an atom's weight of good, shall behold it;
text.ar: فَمَن یَعۡمَلۡ مِثۡقَالَ ذَرَّةٍ خَیۡرࣰا یَرَهُۥ

text.en: and he who shall have done an atom's weight of evil, shall behold it.
text.ar: وَمَن یَعۡمَلۡ مِثۡقَالَ ذَرَّةࣲ شَرࣰّا یَرَهُۥ

text.en: Oh, the chargers that run panting,
text.ar: بِسۡمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحۡمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِیمِ وَٱلۡعَـٰدِیَـٰتِ ضَبۡحࣰا

text.en: sparks of fire striking,
text.ar: فَٱلۡمُورِیَـٰتِ قَدۡحࣰا

text.en: rushing to assault at morn,
text.ar: فَٱلۡمُغِیرَ ٰ⁠تِ صُبۡحࣰا

text.en: thereby raising clouds of dust,
text.ar: فَأَثَرۡنَ بِهِۦ نَقۡعࣰا

text.en: thereby storming [blindly] into any host!
text.ar: فَوَسَطۡنَ بِهِۦ جَمۡعًا

text.en: VERILY, towards his Sustainer man is most ungrateful
text.ar: إِنَّ ٱلۡإِنسَـٰنَ لِرَبِّهِۦ لَكَنُودࣱ

text.en: and to this, behold, he [himself] bears witness indeed:
text.ar: وَإِنَّهُۥ عَلَىٰ ذَ ٰ⁠لِكَ لَشَهِیدࣱ

text.en: for, verily, to the love of wealth is he most ardently devoted.
text.ar: وَإِنَّهُۥ لِحُبِّ ٱلۡخَیۡرِ لَشَدِیدٌ

text.en: But does he not know that [on the Last Day,] when all that is in the graves is raised and brought out,
text.ar: ۞ أَفَلَا یَعۡلَمُ إِذَا بُعۡثِرَ مَا فِی ٱلۡقُبُورِ

text.en: and all that is [hidden] in men's hearts is bared
text.ar: وَحُصِّلَ مَا فِی ٱلصُّدُورِ

text.en: that on that Day their Sustainer [will show that He] has always been fully aware of them?
text.ar: إِنَّ رَبَّهُم بِهِمۡ یَوۡمَىِٕذࣲ لَّخَبِیرُۢ

text.en: OH, the sudden calamity!
text.ar: بِسۡمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحۡمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِیمِ ٱلۡقَارِعَةُ

text.en: How awesome the sudden calamity!
text.ar: مَا ٱلۡقَارِعَةُ

text.en: And what could make thee conceive what that sudden calamity will be?
text.ar: وَمَاۤ أَدۡرَىٰكَ مَا ٱلۡقَارِعَةُ

text.en: [It will occur] on the Day when men will be like moths swarming in confusion,
text.ar: یَوۡمَ یَكُونُ ٱلنَّاسُ كَٱلۡفَرَاشِ ٱلۡمَبۡثُوثِ

text.en: and the mountains will be like fluffy tufts of wool....
text.ar: وَتَكُونُ ٱلۡجِبَالُ كَٱلۡعِهۡنِ ٱلۡمَنفُوشِ

text.en: And then, he whose weight [of good deeds] is heavy in the balance
text.ar: فَأَمَّا مَن ثَقُلَتۡ مَوَ ٰ⁠زِینُهُۥ

text.en: shall find himself in a happy' state of life;
text.ar: فَهُوَ فِی عِیشَةࣲ رَّاضِیَةࣲ

text.en: whereas he whose weight is light in the balance
text.ar: وَأَمَّا مَنۡ خَفَّتۡ مَوَ ٰ⁠زِینُهُۥ

text.en: shall be engulfed by an abyss.
text.ar: فَأُمُّهُۥ هَاوِیَةࣱ

text.en: And what could make thee conceive what that [abyss] will be?
text.ar: وَمَاۤ أَدۡرَىٰكَ مَا هِیَهۡ

text.en: A fire hotly burning!
text.ar: نَارٌ حَامِیَةُۢ

text.en: YOU ARE OBSESSED by greed for more and more
text.ar: بِسۡمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحۡمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِیمِ أَلۡهَىٰكُمُ ٱلتَّكَاثُرُ

text.en: until you go down to your graves.
text.ar: حَتَّىٰ زُرۡتُمُ ٱلۡمَقَابِرَ

text.en: Nay, in time you will come to understand!
text.ar: كَلَّا سَوۡفَ تَعۡلَمُونَ

text.en: And once again: Nay, in time you will come to understand!
text.ar: ثُمَّ كَلَّا سَوۡفَ تَعۡلَمُونَ

text.en: Nay, if you could but understand [it] with an understanding [born] of certainty,
text.ar: كَلَّا لَوۡ تَعۡلَمُونَ عِلۡمَ ٱلۡیَقِینِ

text.en: you would indeed, most surely, behold the blazing fire [of hell]!
text.ar: لَتَرَوُنَّ ٱلۡجَحِیمَ

text.en: In the end you will indeed, most surely, behold it with the eye of certainty:
text.ar: ثُمَّ لَتَرَوُنَّهَا عَیۡنَ ٱلۡیَقِینِ

text.en: and on that Day you will most surely be called to account for [what you did with] the boon of life!
text.ar: ثُمَّ لَتُسۡـَٔلُنَّ یَوۡمَىِٕذٍ عَنِ ٱلنَّعِیمِ

text.en: CONSIDER the flight of time!
text.ar: بِسۡمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحۡمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِیمِ وَٱلۡعَصۡرِ

text.en: Verily, man is bound to lose himself
text.ar: إِنَّ ٱلۡإِنسَـٰنَ لَفِی خُسۡرٍ

text.en: unless he be of those who attain to faith, and do good works, and enjoin upon one another the keeping to truth, and enjoin upon one another patience in adversity.
text.ar: إِلَّا ٱلَّذِینَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ وَتَوَاصَوۡا۟ بِٱلۡحَقِّ وَتَوَاصَوۡا۟ بِٱلصَّبۡرِ

text.en: WOE unto every slanderer, fault-finder!
text.ar: بِسۡمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحۡمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِیمِ وَیۡلࣱ لِّكُلِّ هُمَزَةࣲ لُّمَزَةٍ

text.en: [Woe unto him who amasses wealth and counts it a safeguard,
text.ar: ٱلَّذِی جَمَعَ مَالࣰا وَعَدَّدَهُۥ

text.en: thinking that his wealth will make him live forever!
text.ar: یَحۡسَبُ أَنَّ مَالَهُۥۤ أَخۡلَدَهُۥ

text.en: Nay, but [in the life to come such as] he shall indeed be abandoned to crushing torment!
text.ar: كَلَّاۖ لَیُنۢبَذَنَّ فِی ٱلۡحُطَمَةِ

text.en: And what could make thee conceive what that crushing torment will be?
text.ar: وَمَاۤ أَدۡرَىٰكَ مَا ٱلۡحُطَمَةُ

text.en: A fire kindled by God,
text.ar: نَارُ ٱللَّهِ ٱلۡمُوقَدَةُ

text.en: which will rise over the [guilty] hearts:
text.ar: ٱلَّتِی تَطَّلِعُ عَلَى ٱلۡأَفۡـِٔدَةِ

text.en: verily, it will close in upon them
text.ar: إِنَّهَا عَلَیۡهِم مُّؤۡصَدَةࣱ

text.en: in endless columns!
text.ar: فِی عَمَدࣲ مُّمَدَّدَةِۭ

text.en: ART THOU NOT aware of how thy Sustainer dealt with the Army of the Elephant?
text.ar: بِسۡمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحۡمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِیمِ أَلَمۡ تَرَ كَیۡفَ فَعَلَ رَبُّكَ بِأَصۡحَـٰبِ ٱلۡفِیلِ

text.en: Did He not utterly confound their artful planning?
text.ar: أَلَمۡ یَجۡعَلۡ كَیۡدَهُمۡ فِی تَضۡلِیلࣲ

text.en: Thus, He let loose upon them great swarms of flying creatures
text.ar: وَأَرۡسَلَ عَلَیۡهِمۡ طَیۡرًا أَبَابِیلَ

text.en: which smote them with stone-hard blows of chastisement pre-ordained,
text.ar: تَرۡمِیهِم بِحِجَارَةࣲ مِّن سِجِّیلࣲ

text.en: and caused them to become like a field of grain that has been eaten down to stubble
text.ar: فَجَعَلَهُمۡ كَعَصۡفࣲ مَّأۡكُولِۭ

text.en: SO THAT the Quraysh might remain secure,
text.ar: بِسۡمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحۡمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِیمِ لِإِیلَـٰفِ قُرَیۡشٍ

text.en: secure in their winter and summer journeys,
text.ar: إِۦلَـٰفِهِمۡ رِحۡلَةَ ٱلشِّتَاۤءِ وَٱلصَّیۡفِ

text.en: Let them, therefore, worship the Sustainer of this Temple;
text.ar: فَلۡیَعۡبُدُوا۟ رَبَّ هَـٰذَا ٱلۡبَیۡتِ

text.en: who has given them food against hunger, and made them safe from danger.
text.ar: ٱلَّذِیۤ أَطۡعَمَهُم مِّن جُوعࣲ وَءَامَنَهُم مِّنۡ خَوۡفِۭ

text.en: HAST THOU ever considered [the kind of man] who gives the lie to all moral law?
text.ar: بِسۡمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحۡمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِیمِ أَرَءَیۡتَ ٱلَّذِی یُكَذِّبُ بِٱلدِّینِ

text.en: Behold, it is this [kind of man] that thrusts the orphan away,
text.ar: فَذَ ٰ⁠لِكَ ٱلَّذِی یَدُعُّ ٱلۡیَتِیمَ

text.en: and feels no urge to feed the needy.
text.ar: وَلَا یَحُضُّ عَلَىٰ طَعَامِ ٱلۡمِسۡكِینِ

text.en: Woe, then, unto those praying ones
text.ar: فَوَیۡلࣱ لِّلۡمُصَلِّینَ

text.en: whose hearts from their prayer are remote
text.ar: ٱلَّذِینَ هُمۡ عَن صَلَاتِهِمۡ سَاهُونَ

text.en: those who want only to be seen and praised,
text.ar: ٱلَّذِینَ هُمۡ یُرَاۤءُونَ

text.en: and, withal, deny all assistance [to their fellow-men]!
text.ar: وَیَمۡنَعُونَ ٱلۡمَاعُونَ

text.en: BEHOLD, We have bestowed upon thee good in abundance:
text.ar: بِسۡمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحۡمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِیمِ إِنَّاۤ أَعۡطَیۡنَـٰكَ ٱلۡكَوۡثَرَ

text.en: hence, pray unto thy Sustainer [alone], and sacrifice [unto Him alone].
text.ar: فَصَلِّ لِرَبِّكَ وَٱنۡحَرۡ

text.en: Verily, he that hates thee has indeed been cut off [from all that is good]!
text.ar: إِنَّ شَانِئَكَ هُوَ ٱلۡأَبۡتَرُ

text.en: SAY: "O you who deny the truth!
text.ar: بِسۡمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحۡمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِیمِ قُلۡ یَـٰۤأَیُّهَا ٱلۡكَـٰفِرُونَ

text.en: "I do not worship that which you worship,
text.ar: لَاۤ أَعۡبُدُ مَا تَعۡبُدُونَ

text.en: and neither do you worship that which I worship!
text.ar: وَلَاۤ أَنتُمۡ عَـٰبِدُونَ مَاۤ أَعۡبُدُ

text.en: "And I will not worship ~hat which you have [ever] worshipped,
text.ar: وَلَاۤ أَنَا۠ عَابِدࣱ مَّا عَبَدتُّمۡ

text.en: and neither will you [ever] worship that which I worship.
text.ar: وَلَاۤ أَنتُمۡ عَـٰبِدُونَ مَاۤ أَعۡبُدُ

text.en: Unto you, your moral law, and unto me, mine!"
text.ar: لَكُمۡ دِینُكُمۡ وَلِیَ دِینِ

text.en: WHEN GOD'S SUCCOUR comes, and victory,
text.ar: بِسۡمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحۡمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِیمِ إِذَا جَاۤءَ نَصۡرُ ٱللَّهِ وَٱلۡفَتۡحُ

text.en: and thou seest people enter God's religion in hosts,
text.ar: وَرَأَیۡتَ ٱلنَّاسَ یَدۡخُلُونَ فِی دِینِ ٱللَّهِ أَفۡوَاجࣰا

text.en: extol thy Sustainer's limitless glory, and praise Him, and seek His forgiveness: for, behold, He is ever an acceptor of repentance.
text.ar: فَسَبِّحۡ بِحَمۡدِ رَبِّكَ وَٱسۡتَغۡفِرۡهُۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ تَوَّابَۢا

text.en: DOOMED are the hands of him of the glowing countence: and doomed is he!
text.ar: بِسۡمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحۡمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِیمِ تَبَّتۡ یَدَاۤ أَبِی لَهَبࣲ وَتَبَّ

text.en: What will his wealth avail him, and all that he has gained?
text.ar: مَاۤ أَغۡنَىٰ عَنۡهُ مَالُهُۥ وَمَا كَسَبَ

text.en: [In the life to come] he shall have to endure a fire fiercely glowing;
text.ar: سَیَصۡلَىٰ نَارࣰا ذَاتَ لَهَبࣲ

text.en: together with his wife, that carrier of evil tales,
text.ar: وَٱمۡرَأَتُهُۥ حَمَّالَةَ ٱلۡحَطَبِ

text.en: [who bears] around her neck a rope of twisted strands!
text.ar: فِی جِیدِهَا حَبۡلࣱ مِّن مَّسَدِۭ

text.en: SAY: "He is the One God:
text.ar: بِسۡمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحۡمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِیمِ قُلۡ هُوَ ٱللَّهُ أَحَدٌ

text.en: "God the Eternal, the Uncaused Cause of All Being.
text.ar: ٱللَّهُ ٱلصَّمَدُ

text.en: "He begets not, and neither is He begotten;
text.ar: لَمۡ یَلِدۡ وَلَمۡ یُولَدۡ

text.en: "and there is nothing that could be compared with Him.
text.ar: وَلَمۡ یَكُن لَّهُۥ كُفُوًا أَحَدُۢ

text.en: SAY: "I seek refuge with the Sustainer of the rising dawn,
text.ar: بِسۡمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحۡمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِیمِ قُلۡ أَعُوذُ بِرَبِّ ٱلۡفَلَقِ

text.en: "from the evil of aught that He has created,
text.ar: مِن شَرِّ مَا خَلَقَ

text.en: "and from the evil of the black darkness whenever it descends,
text.ar: وَمِن شَرِّ غَاسِقٍ إِذَا وَقَبَ

text.en: "and from the evil of all human beings bent on occult endeavours,
text.ar: وَمِن شَرِّ ٱلنَّفَّـٰثَـٰتِ فِی ٱلۡعُقَدِ

text.en: "and from the evil of the envious when he envies."
text.ar: وَمِن شَرِّ حَاسِدٍ إِذَا حَسَدَ

text.en: SAY: "I seek refuge with the Sustainer of men,
text.ar: بِسۡمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحۡمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِیمِ قُلۡ أَعُوذُ بِرَبِّ ٱلنَّاسِ

text.en: "the Sovereign of men,
text.ar: مَلِكِ ٱلنَّاسِ

text.en: "the God of men,
text.ar: إِلَـٰهِ ٱلنَّاسِ

text.en: "from the evil of the whispering, elusive tempter
text.ar: مِن شَرِّ ٱلۡوَسۡوَاسِ ٱلۡخَنَّاسِ

text.en: "who whispers in the hearts of men
text.ar: ٱلَّذِی یُوَسۡوِسُ فِی صُدُورِ ٱلنَّاسِ

text.en: "from all [temptation to evil by] invisible forces as well as men,"
text.ar: مِنَ ٱلۡجِنَّةِ وَٱلنَّاسِ
